<S%G1487><s%> For If <S%G1063><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Grieve 3076 V-PAI-1S-C You, 5209 P-2AP Also 2532 CONJ Who 5101 I-NSM Is It 2076 V-PXI-3S That 3588 T-NSM Gladdens 2165 V-PAP-NSM Me, 3165 P-1AS 1487 COND Except 3361 PRT-N He Who 3588 T-NSM Is Grieved 3076 V-PPP-NSM By 1537 PREP Me? 1700 P-1GS

And <S%G2532><s%> I Wrote <S%G1125><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> Same, <S%G846><s%> <S%G2443><s%> Lest <S%G3361><s%> Having Come <S%G2064><s%> Grief <S%G3077><s%> I Might Have <S%G2192><s%> ' From Those <S%G575><s%> Of Whom <S%G3739><s%> It Behoves <S%G1163><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> To Rejoice; <S%G5463><s%> Trusting <S%G3982><s%> In <S%G1909><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1699><s%> My Joy That <S%G5479><s%> Of All <S%G3956><s%> You <S%G5216><s%> Is. <S%G2076><s%>

<S%G1537><s%> For Out Of <S%G1063><s%> Much <S%G4183><s%> Tribulation <S%G2347><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Distress <S%G4928><s%> Of Heart <S%G2588><s%> I Wrote <S%G1125><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> Tears; <S%G1144><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Ye Might Be Grieved, <S%G3076><s%> But <S%G235><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Love <S%G26><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Ye Might Know <S%G1097><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> I Have <S%G2192><s%> More Abundantly <S%G4056><s%> Towards <S%G1519><s%> You. <S%G5209><s%>

<S%G1487><s%> But If <S%G1161><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Has Grieved, <S%G3076><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Me <S%G1691><s%> He Has Grieved, <S%G3076><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> <S%G575><s%> In Part <S%G3313><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> I May Not Overcharge <S%G1912><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> You. <S%G5209><s%>

Sufficient <S%G2425><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Such A One Is <S%G5108><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2009><s%> This Rebuke <S%G3778><s%> Which Is <S%G3588><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Greater Part; <S%G4119><s%>

So That <S%G5620><s%> On The Contrary <S%G5121><s%> Rather <S%G3123><s%> Ye <S%G5209><s%> Should Forgive <S%G5483><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Encourage, <S%G3870><s%> Lest <S%G3381><s%> <S%G3588><s%> With More Abundant <S%G4053><s%> Grief <S%G3077><s%> Should Be Swallowed Up <S%G2666><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Such A One. <S%G5108><s%>
Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> I Exhort <S%G3870><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> To Confirm <S%G2964><s%> Towards <S%G1519><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Love. <S%G26><s%>

<S%G1519><s%> <S%G5124><s%> For, For This <S%G1063><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Did I Write, <S%G1125><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> I Might Know <S%G1097><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Proof <S%G1382><s%> Of You, <S%G5216><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Everything <S%G3956><s%> Obedient <S%G5255><s%> Ye Are. <S%G2075><s%>

<S%G3739><s%> But To Whom <S%G1161><s%> Anything <S%G5100><s%> Ye Forgive, <S%G5483><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> I; <S%G1473><s%> <S%G2532><s%> For Also <S%G1063><s%> I 1473 P-1NS If 1487 COND Anything 5100 X-ASN I Have Forgiven, 5483 V-RNI-1S Of Whom 3739 R-DSM I Have Forgiven, 5483 V-RNI-1S ' Is For Sake Of 1223 PREP You, 5209 P-2AP In The 1722 PREP Person 4383 N-DSN Of Christ; 5547 N-GSM

That <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> We Should Not Be Overreached <S%G4122><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Satan, <S%G4567><s%> <S%G3756><s%> For Not <S%G1063><s%> Of His <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Thoughts <S%G3540><s%> Are We Ignorant. <S%G50><s%>

<S%G2064><s%> Now Having Come <S%G1161><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Troas <S%G5174><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Glad Tidings <S%G2098><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> A Door <S%G2374><s%> To Me <S%G3427><s%> Having Been Opened <S%G455><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%>

Not <S%G3756><s%> I Had <S%G2192><s%> Ease <S%G425><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4151><s%> In My Spirit <S%G3450><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G2147><s%> At My Not Finding <S%G3165><s%> Titus <S%G5103><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G80><s%> My Brother; <S%G3450><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Having Taken Leave Of <S%G657><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> I Went Out <S%G1831><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Macedonia. <S%G3109><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> <S%G1161><s%> But To God Be <S%G2316><s%> Thanks, <S%G5485><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Always <S%G3842><s%> Leads In Triumph <S%G2358><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Odour <S%G3744><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Knowledge <S%G1108><s%> Of Him <S%G846><s%> Makes Manifest <S%G5319><s%> ' Through <S%G1223><s%> Us <S%G2257><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Place. <S%G5117><s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> Of Christ <S%G5547><s%> A Sweet Perfume <S%G2175><s%> We Are <S%G2070><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To God <S%G2316><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Being Saved <S%G4982><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Perishing; <S%G622><s%>

<S%G3739><s%> To The Ones, <S%G3303><s%> An Odour <S%G3744><s%> Of Death <S%G2288><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Death, <S%G2288><s%> <S%G3739><s%> But To The Others, <S%G1161><s%> An Odour <S%G3744><s%> Of Life <S%G2222><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Life; <S%G2222><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> For <S%G4314><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> Who Is <S%G5101><s%> Competent? <S%G2425><s%>
